From: Tracey Griffin <Tracey.Griffin@chalhoub.com <mailto:Tracey.Griffin@chalhoub.com> >
Date: Monday, 23 September 2024 at 5:02 PM
To: Tracey Griffin <Tracey.Griffin@chalhoub.com <mailto:Tracey.Griffin@chalhoub.com> >
Subject: 2025 Budget Guidance

Good evening, 

 

As promised in Patrick's email last week on the 3-Year Plan and Budget Direction, please find the detailed Budget 2025 guidance for you and your teams as you begin to prepare your budgets. The presentation templates will be sent under separate cover.

 

Two changes in the 2025 Budget letter compared to 2024: 

1.	3-Year Plan Alignment.  As we start the new 3-Year Plan cycle please refer to the memo that Strategy will send in conjunction with this Budget guidance.   2025, is the first year of the 3-Year Plan. 

2.	Balance Sheet.  You will see there are additional expectations and guidance in planning for balance sheets in 2025.  As we look ahead cash and capital planning will be critically important as we balance our operating cash needs and our investments for major Group-wide projects.

As we look ahead cash and capital planning will be critically important as we balance our operating cash needs and our investments for major Group-wide projects. Please place as much attention and focus on balance sheet planning as you do with P&L planning.

If you have any questions once you have reviewed, please reach out to me, Group Finance or your Finance business partners.

 

Cheers,

Tracey

TRACEY GRIFFIN​​​​

CHIEF FINANCIAL OFFICER

M.C.T. FZE

DUBAI

‑

UNITED ARAB EMIRATES

	+971 4 804 5000
